content: cute amigurumi love bug that can be worked up in one evening made of worsted weight yarn with safety eyes and felt eye patches wings are heart shaped the end result is about 4 inches tall perfect last minute gift **please note that this project contains small parts that are not suitable for children it s not meant as a toy for babies or small children ** **this pattern was updated on february 7 2009 there was an error in the original pattern pdf the pattern has been edited to correct the ommision of instructions for heart shaped wings please accept my apologies for the inconvenience yours truly heliinä**
